author: Gus_263
title: Va of the deserts
review: This bohrok va looks like to a turaga, because it have a staff. But it have a krana carried at it's back, and a head maded with a very symmetrical shield. The eye color and the classic brown are very notable in this little set.

author: LegoOinc
title: one my favorites!
review:
one my favorite lego sets.

:D= hammer, creme Krana my one came with the leader one (the one in the picture is the swarm leader krana), cute little feet!

:(=the head can get in the way of the krana flinging funtcion.


overall its a great set

author: hustla187
title: Not that Bad
review: I'm not a fan of Bionicle, but this isn't bad at all. I like the brown legs and head. The stick is kind of pointless and the green teeth are a little wacky. Besides that, this set is pretty good for a Bionicle set.

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO BIONICLE (Bohrok Va) - Pahrak Va Review
review:
This is a good figure to have and it's fun to play with as well.

Box/Instructions

The instruction has only two pages and there're no mistakes in it.

Parts

This set has 27 pieces and it was 3 USD when it was on sale. The price per piece ratio was 11 cents per piece which is a good value for this little figure!

The build

The build is very fun and easy and we also don't need to worry about stickers as well.

The completed model

[img]http://www.klokriecher.de/gallery_pics/l/8553-1.jpg[/img]


The arms, the head, the feet and the torso can be adjusted. On one hand you can see a hammer which LEGO used for turaga Onewa. The back of the bohrok va has a piece where you can put a krana in, too. I really can't complain about this little set - even if this set doesn't do much.

Summary

All in all this set is an great set and I would recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de



Videos I made of this set:

Stopmotion

Review

author: Odeinoichus
title: A hammer, my kingdom for a hammer.
review:
Set #8553 Pahrak Va: Ok, maybe I've been short changing these sets in some of my other reviews, the Bohrok Va may have the same build, but they don't all have the same weapons.

 

Pahrak Va comes with a miniature hammer piece, I'm not sure if it was unique to him, but it wasn't common that's for sure. Aside from unique weapons and unique Krana though the rest of the pieces are all identical, when disassembling these sets for storage you have to be careful not to mix them up. I said before that Lehvak Va is one you should pick up, I think Pahrak Va is also a must have due to his weapon. It may not be Mini-Figure compatible, but it is a great Technic piece to use with other Bionicle sets.

author: catwheeler
title: The baby Bohrok scout Pahrak
review: Pahrak Va is my 3rd favorite bohrok (my first favorite is Tahnok and my second  is Pahrak). I love to collect the fun big and little bohrok and i am a bohrok fan. I also like the bohrok kal. I love the tan Krana mask. I love Pahrak in the larger version too. I have him too.
